talk.author: did:plc:vhndxju2lu4wo54fq3a7j2rt
talk.utter:
From an outsider, it seems to me no one, not Hamas or Israel, care about the well-being of Palestinians. 

So my question is, who is benefitting from this conflict? That person is the true enemy.

talk.author: did:plc:32nqa4ogjnh55z62w5q4ancx
talk.utter: What do you mean? Hamas was created and funded by Israel as opposition against Fatah, but it backfired. If you're saying Hamas doesn't care about Palestinians because of Oct 7, why do you think Oct 7 happened? Because Palestinians were being killed silently before it. Most of the world only know O7.

talk.author: did:plc:vhndxju2lu4wo54fq3a7j2rt
talk.utter: I am ASKING who is benefitting from this continued conflict? It certainly isn’t the Palestinians. Whoever is benefiting from this is the culprit. Find him. Remove him and there will be peace. People inherently want peace.

talk.author: did:plc:vhndxju2lu4wo54fq3a7j2rt
talk.utter: I am ASKING who is benefitting from this continued conflict? It certainly isn’t the Palestinians. Whoever is benefiting from this is the culprit. Find him. Remove him and there will be peace. People inherently want peace.

talk.author: did:plc:rb5xg7rwgkikwwoczssk66k2
talk.utter: Israel. Israel is benefiting. It’s about the land and ethnic cleansing, always has been.

talk.author: did:plc:vhndxju2lu4wo54fq3a7j2rt
talk.utter: The entire country is not benefitting because Israelis are casualties too. There is really just one person benefitting. Find that person, remove him or her and peace can be had.

talk.author: did:plc:vhndxju2lu4wo54fq3a7j2rt
talk.utter: The entire country is not benefitting because Israelis are casualties too. There is really just one person benefitting. Find that person, remove him or her and peace can be had.

talk.author: did:plc:rb5xg7rwgkikwwoczssk66k2
talk.utter: It’s not just one person though. We have seen how many Israelis support this genocide.

talk.author: did:plc:vhndxju2lu4wo54fq3a7j2rt
talk.utter: But it is not the entire population of either side. And supporting a policy is not having the authority to keep the conflict going. It is one person. It could be an advisor, a leader. It is not a people.

talk.author: did:plc:vhndxju2lu4wo54fq3a7j2rt
talk.utter: But it is not the entire population of either side. And supporting a policy is not having the authority to keep the conflict going. It is one person. It could be an advisor, a leader. It is not a people.

talk.author: did:plc:32nqa4ogjnh55z62w5q4ancx
talk.utter: It is not the entire population, true, but it isn't one person either. It is a project of a group of people and the majority of the population supports it through brainwashing. However, the majority of the population are responsible as well, why do you think their leader can still keep going?

talk.author: did:plc:vhndxju2lu4wo54fq3a7j2rt
talk.utter:
I know it is easier to think it is a group think situation, but it is not. There is one person fanning these flames. And it is someone who knows the buttons of both sides. 

.
